headline: CoreSite AI Push Highlights American Tower Value And Evolving Growth Story
summary: CoreSite, an American Tower (NYSE:AMT) company, expanded its AI enablement and partner ecosystem under Chief Revenue Officer Maile Kaiser. Kaiser was recognized on the 2026 CRN Channel Chiefs list, highlighting leadership in channel and partner development. For you as an investor, this update sits at the intersection of AMT's traditional tower business and the role of data centers in supporting AI workloads. CoreSite operates as American Tower's data center and interconnection arm, giving...

headline: Revenge Of The Dividend Stocks
summary: Dividend stocks outperformed AI and tech since Nov. 2025. My current buy list favors REITs and cash ETFs amid a risk-off environment. Read more here.
